patterns_discovered.description: Systematic conversion of left/right CSS positioning to logical properties (insetInlineStart/End)
Auto-updating status file to track progress through subtasks and sessions
Large feature (RTL support) broken into 13 distinct subtasks

gotchas_discovered.details: Attempt 1 already completed the positioning audit successfully, suggesting robust implementation on first try

gotchas_discovered.details: Status file only shows progress counters; actual component modifications not visible in diff

recommendations.recommendation: Document the specific components audited and positioning conversions made (left→insetInlineStart, right→insetInlineEnd) for future RTL compliance verification
Ensure RTL mode testing covers all audited components to verify logical properties function correctly in both LTR and RTL contexts
Consider detailed commit messages or separate tracking for component-by-component changes to improve visibility into which specific components were modified
Track remaining 4 subtasks (13-9=4) to ensure RTL implementation completes successfully with consistent quality
